name: v2.7.0 - "Flint"
body:
## Features

### New UI
A new initial screen for viewing your projects and overall editor UI enhancements have arrived in this update.

![Initial Greet Screen UI Preview](https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/assets/60296487/16ff6160-c8ed-4fa1-89b6-90ec50c30b80)

![New UI in the Editor](https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/assets/60296487/03efc0bb-8c54-43f3-aa56-7654895f6883)

- - -

### Auto Recompile on External Changes (Native Build Only)
In 2.7.0, bridge. now watches for external changes and will automatically recompile. No more manually hitting refresh project after making an edit in Blockbench! 

- - -

## Changes
- Compiler log starts at the bottom now (0dfecf7)
- Scripting API completions are now based on manifest files (f164657)
- Author field now defaults to `bridge` in the project creation screen instead of being blank (8f3d3f4)
- Updated scripting preset (6547b94)
- Improved zipping and unzipping speed on the native build (bd2bff0)
- Data updated to the latest preview (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor-packages/pull/63) Thanks to @ExDrill

## Fixes
- Fix drag and drop on the native build (646f2ff)
- Potential fix for permissions not working on linux (e0652e0)
- Virtual files now no longer show up under connected files (https://github.com/bridge-core/dash-compiler/commit/8fa35c73292f6382747d0f411fca26431a6d2c8e)
- Fix generator script collections not working when the script is using typescript (https://github.com/bridge-core/dash-compiler/commit/9aec73004ef30fd1adca518a6b3217366deb7751)

## Final Notes
This is the first major update since SolvedDev's disappearance. As I am still familiarizing myself with the codebase, there is bound to be bugs. Please be patient as I grow accustomed to it. Thank you to everyone who is out there using bridge. The community gives me so much motivation to work on this project.

name: v2.6.1
body:
## Changes
- Updated bridge.'s data to the latest Minecraft Preview (1.20.20) & Stable Release (1.20.0) (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor-packages/pull/39, thanks to @Joelant05, @pascal541, @NguyenDuck, @ExDrill, @outercloudstudio )
- Bridge now starts with it's window maximized (ad2d7362c4e7674a31d82436d1c6f0e8f4102832, thanks to @outercloudstudio)
- Improved Japanese translations (7e80da9a2f7d56bdc72192462dc10a9956d5603e, Thanks to @toka7290!)
- Bumped the json5 package (20eb14f1bad405953e57c936353c406cd00fd6ec)
- JSON files will now automatically be formatted when created (302c2a6c1258d2b712de6bf011c136cf96443a66, thanks to @outercloudstudio)
- Block components which are no longer Holiday Creature Feature experiments no longer require the Holiday Creator Feature Toggle (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor-packages/pull/48, thanks to @ThomasOrs )

## Fixes
Thanks to @outercloudstudio for these fixes:
- Fixed loading screen being jumpy (5633178346af77696a1546d47f06f53fb618172d)
- Fixed the ability to import multiple files at once (c42660a74142ec57151981853e90c91114010c5d)
- Fixed tab order reversing when opening a project (0ff40470d79804e528fda90bf214de0592e7dcea)
- Fixed a soft lock that could occur when trying to preview a model with no textures (0b0934a8b00b916ce909eba2aacaa06f79ce46e7)
- Fixed the ability to drop folders on bridge native build (c2e153185db4ff7431f1f4ca94567239f9db8607)
- Fixed a missing id in an extension preventing new project from being created (834d4d76fef84dd167d124dcfe4b4983d9600aec)
- Fixed dragging elements in the tree editor causing errors (bb72494cfa43162893dd44d5fa99b7a01d545e3d)
- Fixed bridge suggesting users on tablets to download bridge native (6cc8a9fb84fcb577964987b509e3f0a720877d20)

name: v2.6.0 - "Coral"
body:
## Features:

### Tree Editor Validation (#825)
bridge. v2.6.0's tree editor now supports showing JSON schema validation errors. This should help our users identify problems earlier and brings the tree editor closer to our text editor.

![Tree editor validation](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/211159936-cc1eaa22-48b0-45a3-99cc-e7d810e4b24a.png)

- - -

### Launch Minecraft (#845)
You can now launch Minecraft with bridge. by pressing "F5".

!["Launch Minecraft" action](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/211159690-37be4122-ca17-4f5f-bae9-50d1f29fd74e.png)

- - -


### About Window (#819)
We have added a new about window to show the currently installed version of bridge. and link out to our Twitter, Discord and GitHub.

![The new about window](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/211159765-19603c8a-53f7-4f64-9e73-27b9bed194b6.png)


- - -

### New Error Window (#823)
bridge. v2.6.0 ships with a new window for displaying errors. It now includes convenient buttons for directly reporting a bug and copying the error text

![The new error window](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/211159821-84d8d7e3-7f86-4be7-9db4-09f53bf25873.png)

- - -

### Update Window (#834)
Starting with bridge. v2.6.0, a prompt window will open upon starting the native app if an update is available.

![The new update window](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/211159882-c36a0a04-6911-4923-bed3-c3f85af32020.png)

- - -

### View bridge. Folder (#843)
It is now easier to access the folder in which bridge. stores your projects on our native build.

!["View bridge. Folder" action](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/211159698-b68c3305-072a-4a36-b96c-45846def6556.png)

- - -

### Better Discord RPC (#820)
bridge. now displays the file type of the current file you are editing within your Discord status.

## Changes:
- Added support for the latest Minecraft Preview (6ab52ab2dfbdb71df6a74ac9467a43a391762943)
- Removed unused first project logic (d9c37d7d63ebcf75b80a9e81eb7a9c93df375640)
- Solid windows now respect user themes (#837)
- It is now possible to view com.mojang projects if no bridge. projects were created yet (#845)

## Fixes:
- Fixed web app build (38b4b2e0e7ee974b37806728586d091696422d68)
- Fixed various issues connected to virtual files (#817)
- Fixed mobile context menu overflowing available screen space (#822)
- Fixed native app suggestion on mobile (#828; Thanks to @ThomasOrs)
- Fixed remote alert color (f93f1a3f9d6c93aa246d55d1c01e80adc3e770af)
- Fixed JSON schema warning: Ignore "markdownDescription" (71fe4fff54f2d801be5644e869bfba8ed81446f0)
- Disabled spellcheck on all input elements (947ef4f786a78d3ab9c3f84f6123d21c75e00915)
- Fixed custom component scope (993fa803e7fa553b0ecaf5cbfa400eab2c581271)
- Fixed extensions infinitely loading (#841)
- Fixed "Reveal In File Explorer" action for com.mojang projects (#841)
- Fixed preprocessor scripts (bridge-core/editor-packages#32; Thanks to @Tschipp)

- Fixed images not opening correctly

# Fixes:

- Fixed various conditions for Tauri app (#786)

name: v2.5.0 - "Bedrock"
body:
## Features:
### Native bridge. v2 builds (#740)
We now publish native builds for Windows, MacOS and Linux alongside our existing web apps. You can download a native build from our [downloads page](https://bridge-core.app/guide/download/).

![native-app](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/206753164-6eb4fa11-847b-4e59-963a-8f3280828262.png)


- - -
### Reveal in File Explorer (Native App Only; 83724101bab33a6b44f392ca4679f9e0b9d227de)
You can once again quickly open a file within your operating system's native file explorer.

![reveal-file-explorer](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/206753158-892723bb-d86b-4a6c-8722-93fa183344da.png)

- - -

### Built-in Terminal (Native App Only; #755)
bridge. now has a built-in terminal that you can use to work on your project more efficiently.

![terminal](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/206753135-6e489e17-fb9d-4202-9cc3-10c15ffff3cb.png)

- - -

### Compiler Logs Panel (#755)
You no longer need to open the compiler window to inspect compilation issues. Simply pull up bridge.'s bottom panel while working on your project to see errors.

![compiler](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/206753118-17ec14db-41b2-4879-ac43-a50cd516d521.png)

- - -

### Import Projects (Native App Only; #756)
You can import projects into our native app by using the new "Import Projects" button on the home view.

![import-projects](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/206753075-ba1b6b35-c2a6-4604-bf40-cfea1b16409b.png)

- - -

### Open with Snowstorm (#754)
You can now easily open particles from bridge. with Snowstorm v2.5.0.

![open-snowstorm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/206753063-123590ab-a935-4daa-a25d-b45c46f0d381.png)

- - -

### Script API Types (#758)
We now load script API types on demand. This makes it easier for us to pull in types for new Minecraft versions and reduces the size of bridge.'s data package that you need to download.

### Faster Dash Builds (Native App Only; 40e850a6954c1e03ccaed2fa6f9fbb2a16466f13)
Dash on our native app can now make use of optimized file system calls for up to 2x faster builds.

## Changes:
- Updated data to latest Minecraft Preview and stable Minecraft release (462ed09698d6c6c52cce61baddb042f5263bf062, db04f1e7030d83b6716ddaf95ce1504aed800c64, ca445c2d564917b8a465797a2a1ae5b7928b433b, 547ac053b0916757ff9e358ab9f425a4047d388f)
- bridge.'s native app now automatically infers the location of your com.mojang folder (08a36cb049e74fa9a7ce4745e6746239009dc9cb)
- Data updates now apply faster (69b0372e01a231af0e5d7f57e8128830ae6c7073)
- JSON schemas now load significantly faster (#746)
- Internal: Improved bridge.'s file sharing method (f6f3d9d87d2928e38f2f57166b15f2e6b59e7e9a)
- Internal: Support for building UIs with SolidJS (#753)
- Support for "lastModified" timestamp on mobile (#749)
- SetupView: Changed setup message to indicate next steps (a801b6980751c3a0d232f20c2cdc7781dcc7700e)
- Made directory copying more than 230x faster (#761)


## Fixes:
- Fixed file renaming on mobile (#751)
- Fixed inactive tab display (#763)

name: v2.4.2
body:
## Features:
- Updated data to latest Minecraft Preview

name: v2.4.1
body:
## Features:

### Color Picker & Preview (#614)
bridge. now supports previewing colors within JSON files inline and editing them conveniently with a color picker.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64587014/189728421-9216f0a5-14bc-405a-a0f6-05739939d827.png)

## Changes:
- Ability to configure folder indentation (#730)

## Fixes:
- Fixed transformFiles compilation step overwriting files in rare cases (https://github.com/bridge-core/dash-compiler/commit/8178e1d3700b805e7ab57148b96b6f6bffe05541)
- Fixed "molang" plugin no longer transforming Molang statements (#732)
- Fixed custom item components using the player API (#489)
- Dash now creates a default hooks map upon loading cache file (https://github.com/bridge-core/dash-compiler/commit/4741b9272e9d4148ae29f8403dbadfb62f5e38a5)
- Fixed generator scripts generating files to wrong output location (#735) 
- "useTemplate" within generator scripts now works reliably (https://github.com/bridge-core/dash-compiler/commit/7a26aff5b970946507f4194abd16ac68e2ff01b1)

name: v2.4.0 - "Glazed Terracotta"
body:
bridge. v2.4.0 - "Glazed Terracotta" finally makes it easier to edit models from a bridge. project with Blockbench. We have also made substantial improvements to our tree editor, the performance of ZIP file importers and we have again made Dash, our built-in compiler, faster.

Additionally, this update marks the first release that is part of our new fixed schedule update strategy. Going forward, we intend to release a new minor update (v2.X.0) every month and up to two weekly patch updates right after a new minor update. We hope that this change produces less stress for us and can help you experience new features faster.

## Features:

### Blockbench Integration (#690)
bridge. now natively integrates Blockbench. We use a [custom built fork of Blockbench](https://github.com/bridge-core/blockbench) that can communicate directly with bridge. to make the experience as smooth as possible. Opening a model opens all connected files automatically and file saving will just work and re-compile your changes automatically.

![Screenshot of Blockbench within bridge.](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/201474469-0d40aa7f-150a-4c29-b425-32c37a433b26.png)

---

### iframe API (#690)
We have added several new capabilities to our iframe API to make the Blockbench integration possible. You can read more about this API [on our new docs](https://bridge-core.app/extensions/iframe-api/index.html).
- Added new "fs.readAsDataUrl" trigger
- Added "packIndexer.find" trigger
- Added "packIndexer.getFile" trigger
- Added "tab.setIsUnsaved" trigger
- Added "tab.setIsLoading" trigger

### More Efficient Importers (#702, #718)
All ZIP importers now use a streaming solution that is slightly faster and more memory efficient.

### Tree Editor Documentation (#717)
You can now right click parts of your JSON to see documentation when it is available.

![Screenshot of new documentation view](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/201474518-94843fcd-4385-475f-87e3-974325b1b53d.png)

---

### Tree Editor Location Bar (#724)
You can now use the tree editor's new location bar to navigate through large files.

![Screenshot of the new location bar](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33347616/201474572-f02eeefd-142b-4f6d-b42a-2afa84f8532a.png)

---

### Dash v0.10.7 (a0e8950db3dadcbed33286e011f46f6e085b609e)
This update to Dash comes with another set of significant performance optimizations. We are seeing improvements on real projects of anywhere between 20%-50% faster full builds.

## Changes:
- Updated vanilla data to latest Minecraft Preview
- Removed new execute command from experimental gameplay for Minecraft 1.19.50+ (8bbd0e9115e1865c9a12aad2151158b4448a52ba)
- Zipping directories is now faster (#698)
- ".brproject" files no longer include the "builds" folder (#699)
- Updated Japanese translations (#703; Thanks to @toka7290)
- Updated 1.19.40 script types (bridge-core/editor-packages#30)

## Fixes:
- Fixed sounds not stopping upon closing sound player (#708)
- bridge. now works properly when used offline (#697)
- Removed stale data package (#719)
- Added "enterkeyhint" to tree editor inputs (#719) 
- Fixed fullscreen action visibility (#722)
- Fixed custom command schema generation (#723)
- Made file/folder dropping possible while windows are visible (#714)
- Arrays are now handled correctly within the tree editor (#716)
- Better errors upon custom command schema generation failure (#725)
- Correct block description schema where "creative_group" should be "group" (#715)

name: v2.3.7
body:
## Features:
- Added ability to view tab content in fullscreen mode (#687)
- Added automatic integration tests for JSON schemas (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/commit/811e7088b3dfce5f6dbaf597b9ff568661d866eb)
- Added various new iframe APIs (#688)

## Changes:
- Removed unnecessary file from schemas (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/commit/20a67090945f1119e5dc356bcee0bdb719771612)
- Added missing dynamic schema file (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/commit/20a67090945f1119e5dc356bcee0bdb719771612)


## Fixes:
- Fixed various schema warnings (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/commit/860416599fb7f40291b24e271b1b8f2b913a46ff)
- Fixed unreliable iframe connection (#694)

name: v2.3.6
body:
## Features:
- Added support for mouse keybindings (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/668)
- Added "Quick Exports" on mobile devices (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/665)
- Added cursor undo/redo actions (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/669)
- Updated data to support the latest Minecraft Preview
- Added support for playing sounds directly within bridge. (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/656)
- Added support for displaying models without a connected client entity file (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/671)

## Fixes:
- Turned off bridge. predictions by default until we manage to properly fix them (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/672)
- Fixed pack types not being inferred on the home view correctly (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/667)
- Fixed project imports (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/666)
- Fixed ".brproject" exports growing in size (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/675)
- Fixed project import overwriting existing projects (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/651)
- Fixed ".bbmodel" animation imports (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/676)
- Fixed experimental block auto-completions (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/commit/8f28bfc5d2b4ee42244169977c2c19e0479aacf9)
- Fixed versioning and experimental gameplay filtering of block components (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/issues/670)

name: v2.3.5
body:
## Features:
- Infer file path for imported sound files correctly (bridge-core/editor-packages#29)
- Ability to refresh folder within the  directory viewer (#659)

## Changes:
- Added "1.19.50" format version (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/658/commits/ea61a76b33e0a908c638ef212ba8d07f86eb47bf)
- Optimized directory copying (#650)

## Fixes:
- Fixed wrong file extension being appended upon exporting project on Android (#655)
- Fixed wrong icon color for ImageTab (#657)
- Removed rounded window corners on mobile (#652)
- Fixed project exports on mobile devices (#661)

name: v2.3.4
body:
Thanks to @Joelant05, @outercloudstudio, @MiemieMethod and @pascal541 for working on this release!

## Features:
- Made importing ".bbmodel" files significantly faster (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/b267525c3c4d0e700d4a081c1c1640a911bad081)
- Made pack indexing significantly faster (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/da3068861022a1f3bb42122f21079e8ee6bdfb98)
- Made Dash up to 2x faster (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/a511e368cd9fa139f3219185fcc1ea76e91958fe)
- Made installation of files from extensions faster (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/baaa77bc16499562f67551860a116f77b5bf5c04)
- New "Import File" action within the directory viewer (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/b70d92988d05de580e414b25b731da06964c8a34)
- Update bridge.'s data to latest Minecraft Preview (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/4bc6be4066874d149633d01bd9bbfc8d57c2785c)
- New "project.getItemPreview" API for our rich iframe integrations (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/68b73bd0de54cbbfce0e1b21b750428e4192f948)
- Added a new setting to enable/disable "com.mojang" project loading (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/8954dcdcf3878acfeefb562409776d569a838a6f)
- Always show available compiler plugin names (#636)
- Small redesign of our mobile app (#640)
- Added quick actions for switching tabs (#646)
- Added a new auto save setting (#645)

## Changes:
- Added more "title" fields to schemas (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/93a74841ed7541d21bba67ec125a30ba0646d2a7)
- Changed custom geometry block preset to create full 16x16 block (#536)
- Formatted preset files (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/4fbc39a475ea627061bfafb9376d9573cd246100)
- Added "allowMultiple" property to function schema (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/2517ea6e09efb64c49a17c2fbebd73fd7d48fb39)
- Added currently unused schema for molang language (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/85083bcbbdd1297a5a931fac3d3a3d56bbcb03f6)
- Updated "zh_CN" locales to v2.3.3 latest version (#613)
- Bumped Vite to latest version (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/5d7f69bf1d6fca024c701b444aacdada41ec9aab)
- Better fallback font when Roboto fails to load (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/4695753825ebbe87f0c842f48bb139713545d51a)
- Updated latest stable Minecraft version (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/8f57f1559b530b14365695c1bd8fa3954a4f64fd)
- Introduced versioning for recipe schemas (#357)
- Updated Dutch translations (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/5cb3df2c457d4fd0e81aa436bec3416c9f9ca3a3)
- Removed double prompt for setting up "com.mojang" output folder (#644)
- Only allow global installations on HomeView (#647)

## Fixes:
- Support decimal values in block ticking component range (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/0a269bb70366262fd4d452cbc9b003ea46affa95)
- Fixed subcommands not parsing selectors (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/25174732b16a622b66c7ccea1299d490f4847ed2)
- Fixed validation of negated score data (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/e7c42f77dbdebd0ce12fe4739bd828f450a4367d)
- Fixed "allowMultiple" arguments (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/2608f0cae95336d4844ff66898bd6603433eb5dd)
- Fixed json data command argument not being reconstructed (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/2608f0cae95336d4844ff66898bd6603433eb5dd)
- Fixed file downloads from tree editor (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/77d4b372d78ae6a271ee2a75a1211c5d89fab327)
- Fixed "tickingarea" command argument radius with wrong type (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/c9ca434a81b920d986c03c0551ff31ece90023b3)
- Allow usernames within in selectors (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/8b981366759641002ced0ac01d799df9d301f0d4)
- Fixed clone command destination and end arguments (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/353b9c6369dfb76514ff7011d10c3a712c9e94d5)
- Fixed "[]" with "@" in front not being properly constructed (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/6474f5a8593e8a9391323fdf8a8ab20badb560ef)
- Fixed issue with importing UI components from other UI components (#595)
- Fixed error when sometimes opening directory viewer context menu on touch devices (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/84d474def378f1596f263a24d38b394aa5573991)
- Fixed "getProjectAuthors" extension API (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/ef01614a064502b40ac824ac62667a07ef09b64f)
- Fixed issue where data sometimes wasn't properly refreshed after an update (#620)
closes 
- Fixed error upon choosing texture location for ".bbmodel" file (#615)
- Fixed ".bbmodel" file using incorrect identifier for models (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/933c51cc51b998b16a783ca1f76c8bb01c2128df)
- Removed unused imports (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/464f0bc958392d6d9a88d8034a370a71a53fbc30)
- Await "com.mojang" folder being available before creating dash service (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/cc13984781f1cbd52b9fea6ae7f75893dbf97a73)
- Remove "generated_with" from manifest if disabled (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/5023d2f783d192293175d3c8181d481f409ba3a6)
- Fixed preset window icon colors (#622)
- Fixed file import folder name (#634)
- Fixed virtual project activation
- Fixed error upon opening "New File" window (#637)
- Load all projects button now also works for "com.mojang" projects (#641)
- Fixed infinite loading after first setting up "com.mojang" folder (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/638/commits/37360174a7fdaadd5e28b3021cf5c845c7400fc4)

name: v2.3.3
body:
## Features
### Improved `.lang` file support
- Dynamic auto-completions are now data driven and values are guessed based off of the key (8bcc57b4f2052ae14c69e2655fe659cc3cd98586)
- Syntax highlighting for project namespace
- Validation and quick fix options (c9dbe1a7ef8b4aac7e336bec6d210d254986ab9e, 59cb43e7587f5d651323a52978e475ea47bf6408)
![lang-support](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64587014/189486739-20497bab-f928-497c-84a6-c96daf7f41b8.png)


### New tree editor display mode (d5da20057dd7018d7cf49ab62058b339ab7c0061)
- Added the option to enable a more 'bridge. v1 like' tree editor with numbered arrays, hidden brackets and more!
![tree_editor_display](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64587014/189485213-af07bdd7-f48b-49d2-868d-49482bfbb242.png)

### `.mcfunction` file validation ([#591](https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/pull/591))
- Function files are now validated against our command schemas (Thanks to @outercloudstudio!)
- This includes warnings and errors for target selectors and the general shape of a command to help you catch issues before testing in Minecraft
![function-validation](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64587014/189486722-acbc4e0f-b3c1-492b-97d1-1e30b1dc35a0.png)

### Project chooser enhancements
- Internal API for loading window state (0ce193a0ddebf5011404293bb38546d9d83c80af)
- Option to reload the project chooser window (f801bd994fbddd4fdb6dd2375530b2cb573f5280)

## Changes
- Updated data to latest Minecraft preview (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor-packages/commit/4d85cb2a7d9a6f129bef8ce1b1da895eb4ae5cc5)
- Added missing loot command arguments (db5a44f74e68fbad239a78d81b09f9c34ec5c0bf)
- Changed the icons in command auto-completion lists (d07d7268f50e0ac26ebec45f36a06fc2c64c31a9)
- The pack explorer is now refreshed when files are added to a project from an extension with `"contributeFiles"` (9f9ff1abc8c413f90ed04e970a3d9b4c65067599)
- Optimised project loading to be up to 3x faster (a655429fe340d351ff6123bb08f2c388b642b018)
- Optimised `com.mojang` project loading and cache them to make subsequent loads faster (dd3415042cd1e5a3e72f8c0ddf949090d3595554, ebb1db5054bba0b6abb62fb86396f1e7490fdb3e)
- Support RGB color arrays in the `"minecraft:map_color"` block component (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor-packages/commit/3af0d8db0b6ee963f0210319cecf529e52fc249f)
- In file syntax highlighting, the entire word up until `r` is now colored from color code symbols (e9a1a1c4d8c719f6cddcb45dd7b7baf6063a3bb9)
- Updated sword and snowball presets ([editor-packages#28](https://github.com/bridge-core/editor-packages/pull/28), Thanks to @Chikorita-Lover)

## Fixes
- Fixed the usage of `Ctrl + V` in the file rename input (64c73b9a2ab051c8d962122a755e71f8a8652be8)
- Fixed incorrect custom command types (https://github.com/bridge-core/editor-packages/commit/29ce9a4d1ce25ccc1ddc52360d8744e2e370f3fb)
- Fixed iframe tab being visible after tab is closed ([#592](https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/issues/592))
- Fixed `openTab` extension API ([#595](https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/issues/595))
- Fixed `compileProject` extension API (0a7ce3216651f7cad8bbadefdf66710777ebea0a)
- Fixed `com.mojang` folder linking ([#597](https://github.com/bridge-core/editor/issues/597))
- Fixed an error that could occur when quickly switching projects (868aee24684c4a2fbdf77893659af6776450c3a0)
- Prevent recompilation of virtual projects (51c6ce106651a177bf23dee42f02fd9f1cb03148)
- Fixed error when loading extensions (1738f9a43c5b95b532972e75ea25487cdbafd48a)
- Fixed error when the dash cache file is missing (https://github.com/bridge-core/dash-compiler/commit/5d9e77130202da3bc584ba677d1580cf2d18dd53)
